import React from 'react' const Cart = ({cartItems , removeFromCart ,removeAll}) => { return (
{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Cart Empty

) : ( <>
    {cartItems.map((item , index) =>

  • {item.name}

    Price: ${item.price}

    {item.description}
    • )}
) }
) } export default Cart
